Name: Wall Force
About the game: ◉PERSPECTIVE Wall Force is a multiplayer sidescroller shooter game that allows you to compete against AI bots or other players, in a beautiful low poly world. ◉WALL OFF YOUR ENEMY Despite your movement restrictions, a well-coordinated group of players can dominate the enemy team. Use verticality as your advantage, run trough open rooms and spray on your enemies or crawl through tight vents and surprise your enemies. ◉CHOSE YOUR TACTICS Do you prefer run-and-gun or a tactical approach? No need to chose, because there is something for everyone. You can select between different game modes ranging from offline AI team deathmatch all the way to online rush modes. ◉CUSTOM ARSENAL Wall Force offers a wide range of weapons, from low tier WW2 rifles to modern high powered weaponry. ◉PERSONALIZE WEAPONS Modify your favorite weapons with different parts to improve their stats and performance. By leveling up you can unlock a wide variety of weapon attachments.
Meta Title: Wall Force: Feb 28, 2021, Miha Prezelj and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Wall Force? Check out the release date (Feb 28, 2021), developer insights from Miha Prezelj, and a complete game summary.
